summary: In several unrelated stories, the consequences of putting one's foot down - or failing to do so - are explored.
cast: Villmar Björkman|Linnea Cart-Lamy|Leif Edlund|Sara Eriksson|Lola Ewerlund|Alexandra Hummingson|Hanna Lekander|Olle Liljas|Maria Lundqvist|Cecilia Milocco|Simeon Nordius|Guje Palm|Henrik Vikman|Vera Vitali
title: De ofrivilliga
